AppDB.Name: EGRESS_PER_FORWARD_CODE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A configuration table for Egress Forward Code general configuration

Field.Description: Enable forwarding header termination
Field.Name: TERMINATION_ENABLE

Field.Description: Forward code that supports Ethernet processing
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_ETHERNET_ENABLE

Field.Description: Forward code that supports IPv4 UC processing
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV4_UC_ENABLE

Field.Description: Forward code that supports IPv4 MC processing
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV4_MC_ENABLE

Field.Description: Forward code that supports IPv6 processing
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV6_UC_ENABLE

Field.Description: Forward code that supports IPv6 processing
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV6_MC_ENABLE

Field.Description: Forward code that supports MPLS processing
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_MPLS_ENABLE

Field.Description: Forward code that supports stp state filter
Field.Name: STP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable CFG Egress Membership Filter per Forward Code
Field.Name: VLAN_MEMBERSHIP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable acceptable frame type per Forward Code
Field.Name: ACCEPTABLE_FRAME_TYPE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable split horizon per Forward Code
Field.Name: SPLIT_HORIZON_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable learning per Forward Code
Field.Name: LEARN_ENABLE_PER_FWD_CONTEXT

Field.Description: Enabled in case that Forward Context is PP
Field.Name: FWD_CONTEXT_IS_PP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Forward Code is Ipv4 or Ipv6
Field.Name: FORWARD_CODE_IPV4_OR_IPV6

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_ETPP_GLOBAL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Egress General Configuration Table to enable/disable logics in the design

Field.Description: Enable logic - Dsp Resolution
Field.Name: DSP_RESOLUTION_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - IP MC Should Be Bridge
Field.Name: IP_MC_SHOULD_BE_BRIDGE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - IVE
Field.Name: IVE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - Filters
Field.Name: FILTERS_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - Fwd Code
Field.Name: FWD_CODE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - NWK QoS
Field.Name: NWK_QOS_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - SNIFF Expansion
Field.Name: SNIFF_EXPANSION_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - Forwarding Profile
Field.Name: FORWARDING_PROFILE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - Memory Software Errors
Field.Name: MEM_SOFT_ERR_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - ACE
Field.Name: ACE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - CoS Remapping
Field.Name: COS_REMAPPING_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - DSP Processing
Field.Name: DSP_PROCESSING_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - J2j2 FHEI
Field.Name: JR_TO_J2_FHEI_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - J2j2 Inlif Profile
Field.Name: INLIF_PROFILE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - J2j2 TTL
Field.Name: JR_TO_J2_TTL_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - Final Pointer Resolution
Field.Name: FINAL_PTR_RESOLUTION_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable logic - PRP Pema Context
Field.Name: PRP_PEMA_CONTEXT_ENABLE

Field.Description: Must enabled fields to make ETPP functional
Field.Name: ETPP_ENABLE

Field.Description: When source idx is invalid, the field is used as the msb of source_idx.
Field.Name: SOURCE_IDX_MSB

Field.Description: Bypass Stamp Ftmh Enable
Field.Name: BYPASS_STAMP_FTMH_ENABLE

Field.Description: When set, ETPP Latency is fixed and set to a configurable value.
Field.Name: ETPP_FIXED_LATENCY_EN

Field.Description: If FixedLatencyEn is set, this value will set the latency
Field.Name: ETPP_FIXED_LATENCY

Field.Description: The offset in bytes of the Network headers from the end of system headers
Field.Name: NETWORK_OFFSET

Field.Description: IN_LIF null value in egress pipeline
Field.Name: CFG_IN_LIF_NULL_VALUE

Field.Description: Device CFG for Packet Size Compensation
Field.Name: GENERAL_PACKET_SIZE_COMPENSATION
